Chaochuan Coal Mine No. 1 Well is an underground coal mine located in Xiaotun Town, Ruzhou City, Henan Province

owners: China Pingmei Shenma Energy and Chemical Group
web_search_companies.notes: Pingdingshan Tianan Coal Industry Company operates the mine, which is owned by China Pingmei Shenma Energy and Chemical Group.
